messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package.
What does the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?

The Monthly Extreme Pro Max package includes 100GB of internet, unlimited on-net minutes, 800 off-net minutes, and 10000 SMS for Rs. 1300 including tax. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *345*26#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package.
How can I activate the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
How do I get the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
You can activate the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package by dialing *345*26#. The package offers 100GB of internet, unlimited on-net minutes, 800 off-net minutes, and 10000 SMS for 30 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package.
How long is the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package valid?
What is the validity period of the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package?
For how many days does the Monthly Extreme Pro Max package remain active?
The Monthly Extreme Pro Max package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
